title: Patrick (Risking Love #1).
description: PATRICK Available Now Prologue Serial Killer Link: https://www.goodreads.com/author_blog...Enjoy Chapter One:https://www.goodreads.com/author_blog...Blurb:Jaq had no interest in a serious relationship because life at an early age had taught her that men weren't to be trusted. But she met Patrick who soon had her thinking about risking her heart.As far as Patrick was concerned, Jaq was no longer dating other men. He wanted her all to himself. But would she stay if she knew the secrets of his past?Patrick wasn't the only man who wanted Jaq, and the other man was willing to kill to have her.Patrick is the first novel in the Risking Love series. The stories chart a group of friends through life and love. These steamy stories will have you laughing, crying, and have your heart racing.
author: Callie Carmen
